Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Packages
  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Packages 
    Package and Description
    io.micronaut.http.hateos
    Use the classes in io.micronaut.http.hateoas instead
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    io.micronaut.core.beans.BeanInfo
    Use BeanIntrospection instead
    io.micronaut.http.hateos.Link
    Use Link instead
    io.micronaut.http.hateos.Link.Builder
    Use Link.Builder instead.
    io.micronaut.http.hateos.Resource
    Use Resource instead
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    io.micronaut.http.hateos.AbstractResource
    Use AbstractResource instead
    io.micronaut.http.server.types.files.AttachedFile
    Use instead. This class conflates the source of the data with the type of response being sent. This assumes the file should be sent as an attachment while StreamedFile does not. The SystemFile class now behaves the same as StreamedFile by defaulting to inline with a method to call to set it to be attached. new AttachedFile(file, name) -> new SystemFile(file).attach(name) new AttachedFile(file) -> new SystemFile(file).attach(file.getName())
    io.micronaut.core.beans.Introspector
    Replaced by BeanIntrospector
    io.micronaut.http.hateos.JsonError
    io.micronaut.core.beans.PropertyDescriptor
    Use BeanProperty instead
    io.micronaut.http.server.types.files.SystemFileCustomizableResponseType
    io.micronaut.http.hateos.VndError
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    io.micronaut.http.annotation.HttpMethodMapping.DEFAULT_URI
    Use UriMapping.DEFAULT_URI instead
    io.micronaut.views.ViewsRenderer.FILE_SEPARATOR
    Use File.separator directly
    io.micronaut.web.router.DefaultRouteBuilder.HYPHENATED_NAMING_STRATEGY
    Dynamic naming conventions are no longer supported
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    io.micronaut.context.DefaultApplicationContext.createEnvironment(String...)
    Use DefaultApplicationContext.createEnvironment(ApplicationContextConfiguration) instead
    io.micronaut.http.server.netty.types.files.FileTypeHandler.getMediaType(String)
    The media type now comes from the file types.
    io.micronaut.http.server.types.files.SystemFileCustomizableResponseType.getName()
    io.micronaut.http.server.types.files.SystemFile.getName()
    io.micronaut.http.server.types.files.StreamedFile.getName()
    io.micronaut.http.server.types.files.FileCustomizableResponseType.getName()
    io.micronaut.http.server.netty.types.files.NettySystemFileCustomizableResponseType.getName()
    io.micronaut.spring.core.env.PropertyResolverAdapter.getPropertyAsClass(String, Class<T>)
    io.micronaut.cli.util.NameUtils.isGetter(String, Class<?>[])
    use NameUtils.isGetter(String, Class, Class[]) instead because this method has a defect for "is.." method with Boolean return types.
    io.micronaut.views.ViewsRenderer.normalizeFile(String, String)
    Use ViewUtils.normalizeFile(String, String) instead
    io.micronaut.views.ViewsRenderer.normalizeFolder(String)
    Use ViewUtils.normalizeFolder(String) instead
    io.micronaut.http.server.netty.ByteBufDelegate.order()
    io.micronaut.http.server.netty.ByteBufDelegate.order(ByteOrder)
    io.micronaut.discovery.cloud.aws.AmazonComputeInstanceMetadataResolver.readEc2MetadataJson(URL, int, int)
    See ComputeInstanceMetadataResolverUtils.readMetadataUrl(URL, int, int, ObjectMapper, Map)
    io.micronaut.discovery.cloud.gcp.GoogleComputeInstanceMetadataResolver.readGcMetadataUrl(URL, int, int)
    See ComputeInstanceMetadataResolverUtils.readMetadataUrl(URL, int, int, ObjectMapper, Map)
    io.micronaut.context.env.DefaultPropertyPlaceholderResolver.resolveReplacement(StringBuilder, String, String)
    No longer used internally. See DefaultPropertyPlaceholderResolver.resolveExpression(String, String, Class)
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    io.micronaut.jackson.convert.ArrayNodeToArrayConverter(ObjectMapper)
    Use ArrayNodeToArrayConverter.ArrayNodeToArrayConverter(Provider) instead
    io.micronaut.jackson.convert.ArrayNodeToIterableConverter(ObjectMapper, ConversionService)
    Use ArrayNodeToIterableConverter.ArrayNodeToIterableConverter(ConversionService) instead
    io.micronaut.context.env.DefaultEnvironment(ClassLoader, ConversionService, String...)
    Use DefaultEnvironment.DefaultEnvironment(ApplicationContextConfiguration) instead
    io.micronaut.context.env.DefaultEnvironment(ClassLoader, String...)
    Use DefaultEnvironment.DefaultEnvironment(ApplicationContextConfiguration) instead
    io.micronaut.context.env.DefaultEnvironment(ClassPathResourceLoader, ConversionService, Boolean, String...)
    Use DefaultEnvironment.DefaultEnvironment(ApplicationContextConfiguration) instead.
    io.micronaut.context.env.DefaultEnvironment(ClassPathResourceLoader, ConversionService, String...)
    Use DefaultEnvironment.DefaultEnvironment(ApplicationContextConfiguration) instead
    io.micronaut.context.env.DefaultEnvironment(String...)
    Use DefaultEnvironment.DefaultEnvironment(ApplicationContextConfiguration) instead
    io.micronaut.context.env.DefaultPropertyPlaceholderResolver(PropertyResolver)
    Use DefaultPropertyPlaceholderResolver.DefaultPropertyPlaceholderResolver(PropertyResolver, ConversionService) instead
    io.micronaut.retry.intercept.DefaultRetryInterceptor(ApplicationEventPublisher)
    Use DefaultRetryInterceptor.DefaultRetryInterceptor(ApplicationEventPublisher, ExecutorService) instead
    io.micronaut.discovery.eureka.EurekaConfiguration.EurekaRegistrationConfiguration(EmbeddedServer, ApplicationConfiguration, String, DataCenterInfo)
    Use #EurekaConfiguration(EurekaConnectionPoolConfiguration, ApplicationConfiguration, EurekaRegistrationConfiguration) instead
    io.micronaut.discovery.eureka.EurekaServiceInstanceList(DiscoveryClientConfiguration, ApplicationConfiguration.InstanceConfiguration)
    io.micronaut.views.handlebars.HandlebarsViewsRenderer(ViewsConfiguration, ClassPathResourceLoader, HandlebarsViewsRendererConfiguration)
    io.micronaut.jackson.convert.JsonNodeToObjectConverter(ObjectMapper)
    Use JsonNodeToObjectConverter.JsonNodeToObjectConverter(Provider) instead
    io.micronaut.jackson.bind.MapToObjectConverter(BeanPropertyBinder)
    Use MapToObjectConverter.MapToObjectConverter(Provider) instead
    io.micronaut.jackson.convert.ObjectToJsonNodeConverter(ObjectMapper)
    Use ObjectToJsonNodeConverter.ObjectToJsonNodeConverter(Provider) instead
    io.micronaut.http.resource.ResourceLoaderFactory()
    Use ResourceLoaderFactory.ResourceLoaderFactory(Environment) instead.
    io.micronaut.http.server.types.files.StreamedFile(InputStream, String)
    use StreamedFile.StreamedFile(InputStream, MediaType) instead. See MediaType.forFilename(String) for converting existing names if the type is unknown.
    io.micronaut.http.server.types.files.StreamedFile(InputStream, String, long)
    use StreamedFile.StreamedFile(InputStream, MediaType, long) instead. See MediaType.forFilename(String) for converting existing names if the type is unknown.
    io.micronaut.http.server.types.files.StreamedFile(InputStream, String, long, long)
    use StreamedFile.StreamedFile(InputStream, MediaType, long, long) instead. See MediaType.forFilename(String) for converting existing names if the type is unknown.
    io.micronaut.http.server.codec.TextStreamCodec(HttpServerConfiguration, ByteBufferFactory, Provider<MediaTypeCodecRegistry>, CodecConfiguration)
    io.micronaut.views.thymeleaf.ThymeleafViewsRenderer(ViewsConfiguration, ThymeleafViewsRendererConfiguration, ClassPathResourceLoader)
    io.micronaut.views.ViewsFilter(BeanLocator, ViewsFilterOrderProvider)
    Use ViewsFilter.ViewsFilter(BeanLocator, ViewsFilterOrderProvider, Collection) instead.
